issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Downloaded Appcelerator Studio 4.1
Install as admin
After a while, this error appeared:
!Captura.PNG|thumbnail!

Aparently the installer was not able to access the url http://go.appcelerator.com/installer_git_windows.exe, but I did it manually and after finish the GIT install, I press Ok and the installation continued.

Maybe a retry could solve this little problem.
fields.summary: Appcelerator installer can drop some steps
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1, fresh install
JDK 8_45
Visual Studio 2013 and Windows Mobile 8.1 SDK

comments.body: Can you install  [appcelerator studio|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Setting_up_Studio-section-37540095_SettingupStudio-Windows] again to the latest build. Let us know if you get the error again.
